Hello Everyone,

I hope you've all had a great summer.

The staff here at Evorack have been working very hard recently on our expansion plans. As such, it is with great pleasure that we announce today to the LET community that we are accepting orders for our new infrastructure located in the Melbourne Server Hosting Datacentre in Manchester, UK.

The guys that work at Melbourne are an awesome bunch and have a fantastic network and facility.

As this is a very special occasion for us, we are offering a lifetime **50% discount off all our list prices** from now until the end of September for any VPS ordered for deployment in our new DC. 

As with our rock-solid Gosport infrastructure, we use the Xen Hypervisor software which means that all RAM is dedicated to you (no overselling!). Additionally, we have a very good reputation within the LET,LEB and WHT communities for providing a reliable service.

**By default, all orders are provisioned in our usual Gosport facility so in order to avail of this promotion and our new DC, please use the coupon code NEWMANCHESTER when placing an order at [evorack.com](http://www.evorack.com).**

Here are some example prices:

Evorack VPS128
20GB Disk Space
128MB RAM (512MB Swap configured by default)
250GB transfer per month
1 IPv4 Address
/64 IPv6 Subnet
Cost: £3.00 per month

Evorack VPS350
35GB Disk Space
350MB RAM (512MB Swap configured by default)
350GB transfer per month
1 IPv4 Address
/64 IPv6 Subnet
Cost: £4.00 per month

Test Server: http://www.melbourne.co.uk/speedtest/
Signup Links: http://www.evorack.com/unmanaged-xen-vps.php

Spaces are extremely limited so sign up fast!

If anyone has any questions, please feel free to ask.

Happy Evorackin'!

Cheers

Jonny
